name: Spicy Ramen
description: A flavorful and spicy ramen with ingredients like miso, soy sauce, chili oil, and fresh vegetables. Perfect for spice lovers!

name: Classic Burger
description: A classic American beef burger with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles. Served with a side of crispy fries.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and a homemade tomato sauce on a thin, crispy crust.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
description: Juicy and tender BBQ chicken wings coated in a sweet and smoky barbecue sauce, perfect for sharing.

name: Vegan Smoothie Bowl
description: A refreshing smoothie bowl made with tropical fruits, topped with granola, coconut flakes, and fresh berries.
